item.title: Testing With Java - Part 2 : TDD
item.description: In the annals of software development, there exists a cautionary tale from the year 1996, when the European Space Agency (ESA) launched its ambitious Ariane 5 rocket.

item.title: Rails RESTful API, Outside in TDD
item.description: There is always a disciplined way to do things I was waiting for the coffee dispenser to finish filling up my cup and my mind started wandering.
